mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_ASK (board_ask_number, board_ask_member_id, board_ask_date, board_ask_type, board_ask_title, board_ask_content, board_ask_product_code, board_ask_order_number) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_ASK.NEXTVAL,#{boardAskMemberId}, sysdate, #{boardAskType} ,#{boardAskTitle}, #{boardAskContent}, #{boardAskProductCode}, #{boardAskOrderNumber} )

insert INTO board_review(board_review_number, board_review_member_id, board_review_product_code, board_review_score, board_review_content, board_review_img, board_review_imgpath, board_review_thumbnail) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_REVIEW.nextval, #{boardReviewMemberId},#{boardReviewProductCode}, #{boardReviewScore}, #{boardReviewContent},#{boardReviewImg},#{boardReviewImgpath},#{boardReviewThumbnail} )
